item.title: AWS Load Balancer SSL limitations
item.description: {% raw %} No one else seems to have documented this anywhere, so I'm gonna do it here. Amazon Web Services has a great little load balancer system you can use.  A few clicks, and you're away to the races with a shiny load balancer of your own!  The best part?  It will even do SSL termination at the load balancer for you.  Just paste in your certs and away you go!
